data.description: Introduction to research methods in the communication industry. Overview of all stages of the research process and of translating data into reports for strategic communication recommendations for clients, ranging from industry to policymakers.
data.title: RESEARCH METHODS IN THE COMMUNICATION INDUSTRY

data.description: Examination of social scientific research addressing characteristics of science, public understanding of science, science news, and relationships between scientists and journalists. Application of this knowledge to several case studies examining the function of communication in specific scientific or technical contexts.
data.title: CASE STUDIES IN THE COMMUNICATION OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

data.description: Introduction to communication at the intersection of science, politics and society; overview of the theoretical foundations of science communication and their relevance for societal debates about science and emerging technologies across different parts of the world.
data.title: SCIENCE, MEDIA AND SOCIETY
